imdb.title: Rabu Hina
imdb.plot: When Keitaro was a child, he was friends with a little girl. When the girl had to move away, the two made a promise to meet each other at Tokyo University when they grew up. Years later, Keitaro has failed his entrance exam twice,...

episodes.title: All-Girls Dorm with Outdoor Bath: Hot Spring
episodes.plot: Keitaro Urashima, a young man who has failed the college exams three times, agrees to take over the Hinata Apartments from his grandmother Hina. He finds out the hard way that it is a women's-only dorm when the residents descend on him like angry hornets.

episodes.title: Hinata Apartment's New Resident Shinobu: Arrow Signs
episodes.plot: The residents of Hinata Apartments meet Shinobu Maehara, a shy junior-high school student who is despondent over her parents' bitter divorce.

episodes.title: Kendo Girl in Love?: Swordplay
episodes.plot: When man-hating Motoko returns home from kendo camp, all heck breaks loose at Hinata Apartments when she learns that Keitaro is the apartment manager.

episodes.title: The Tokyo U Promise from 15 Years Ago: Diary
episodes.plot: Keitaro stumbles across Naru's diary, which mentions a promise she made with someone 15 years ago to attend Tokyo University.

episodes.title: The First Kiss Tastes Like Lemon? Marshmallow?: Grown-up
episodes.plot: Shinobu is desperate for her first kiss after her friend Akiko tells Shinobu of her first kiss.

episodes.title: Naru's Crush Is Now a Tokyo U Professor: Turning Into Love?
episodes.plot: Hinata Apartments is in the red, forcing everyone to find jobs in order to pay the bills. Keitaro and Naru find work at Tokyo U, but Keitaro's employer Seta happens to be Naru's old tutor, and old crush. Kisune arrives in a desperate attempt to keep Naru and Seta from meeting again.

episodes.title: I Love You!/Romantic Confession Inside a Cave/Tall Tale
episodes.plot: Seta falls into an underground cave during a dig. Keitaro brings Seta's American daughter Sarah to Hinata Apartments. Sara's shenanigans led Keitaro & Co. to the same cave where Seta is, reigniting Naru old feelings for him.

episodes.title: Monkey Performance at the Seaside Teahouse Hinata: A Kiss?
episodes.plot: Haruka invites Keitaro and the Hinata Apartments residents to the Hinata Seaside Tea House. Much to their dismay, Keitao & Co. realize they are there not to enjoy the sea, but to be put to work. First, they must repair the dilapidated tea house. Second, they must rehearse for the Urashima family's annual production of the Chinese epic "The Journey West" for the local kids.

episodes.title: Marry into Money? A Prince from Across the Sea: Warm
episodes.plot: Crown Prince Lamba Lu, who is Kaolla's cousin, arrives at Hinata Apartments to wed her and take her back to their country.

episodes.title: A Sepia-colored Promise with a Sleeping Girl: A Trick?
episodes.plot: Keitaro stumbles upon a forgotten room deep in the basements of Hinata Apartments. There he finds an old doll that seems to possess a will of its own.

episodes.title: Motoko's Choice/Love of the Sword/Don't Cry!
episodes.plot: Motoko's older sister Tsuruko makes a surprise visit, and tries to take Motoko home to become their clan's successor. In a panic, Motoko avoids leaving Hinata Apartments by announcing that she is engaged to marry Keitaro, which is news to him.
